snippet.title: Chronicles of Etia: A Yuletide Story trailer
snippet.description:
The second episode prelude in the Chronicles of Etia series. The continuation of the story of Arminel and Cassia. It is a story of magic, awakenings and evil fairies. 

It will be available as a free download for PC and Mac OS X. Will be released on December 1st 2021. 

You can download it on itch.io at:

https://kallisti777.itch.io/
